name: Meta-Dating
description: Meta-Dating follows the similar style of traditional dating simulators but allows the player to earn achievements in the game. You play as a high school student, Kirito,  and go through his first day of school.  Kirito will meet some girls along the way and you will make decisions. Your decisions will impact the ending and what achievements you will acquire. The player will be updated when an achievement becomes unobtainable.
